K. NAUMOV AND L. V. VILENSKAYA 1r lr 10 V0 1981 PARAPSYCHOLOGICAL ASSOCIATION P.O. Box 7503 Alexandria, Virginia, USA Approved For Release 2002/05/17 : CIA-RDP96-00788R001300230001-3 Approved For Release 2002/05/17 : CIA-RDP96-00788R001300230001-3 FOREWORD This remarkable bibliography was given to Christopher Bird by one of the authors, Larissa Vilenskaya, a Russian engineer and psi researcher, when she was in New York recently for a meeting. It represents some ten years of dedicated labor by herself and Edward Naumov, and cites refer- ences as recent as early 1980. It covers most of the publications in the USSR in "psychotronics, psychoenergetics, psychobiophysics and related problems," to use their words, and is arranged by topics. The PA, recognizing the value of this unique document and the fact that it has not been published, even in Russia, arranged to have it trans- lated. The Parapsychology Foundation agreed to assist with the publishing costs, so that it can be made available at a nominal price to the scien- tific community and others interested in this field. We are all indebted to the Foundation for their willingness to do so. Ian Stevenson and Emily Williams undertook the considerable chore of carefully proof-reading the entire manuscript. They found a large number of editorial problems, most of which have been corrected by hand. A few discrepancies between different spellings of the apparently same name were unchanged, where the correct spelling could not be determined. Some sym- posium titles were not translated, and some editorial niceties such as conventional punctuation and syllabification of broken words were left where it was felt the hand correction would be more of a distraction than a benefit. Where a symposium or collection is translated in the first citation but not later, the earlier translation is cited thus: "(cf. #55)."
